channel.title: Rotel on Audio Electronics Learning Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Rotel on Audio Electronics Learning Lab

item.title: Rotel RM-5010 — AUX Input Implementation
item.description: Add a stereo AUX input using an isolated jack, coupling capacitors, optional RF resistors, and correct single-point signal grounding.

item.title: Rotel RM-5010 — LED Dial / Panel Lighting Conversion
item.description: Replacing 12 VAC dial lamps with LED assemblies using bridge rectification, smoothing capacitors, and PWM dimming.
